channel.title: Client Problems GUI
channel.description:
About a month ago i have been having a lot of client issues. Every client i download, i will get a gui error. It says can not find main class gui. But it is in the server data and i can physically find it but the clients can not.
-Thanks
-Corry

item.title: Client Problems GUI
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Compile, then try again, if not, put the run where the .class files are.

Read full topic
